  Administration | City of Reno, TX           

**Hours:** Mon-Fri 8:00AM – 5:00 PM.   
Closed for lunch 11:00AM – 12:00 PM.

![clock](https://www.renotx.gov/wp-content/themes/reno/assets/images/phone.png)

City Hall Phone [(817) 221-2500](tel:+1(817) 221-2500)

* City of Reno Blessing Box now available for any family in need, located at 195 W Reno Road Azle TX 76020.

Administration
==============

![](https://www.renotx.gov/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/CA-Paul-Lilly.png)

Paul Lilly

City Administrator / Director of Public Safety

Office: 817-221-2500

[![Email](https://www.renotx.gov/wp-content/plugins/team-members/inc/img/links/email.png)](mailto:paul.lilly@renotx.gov "Email")

###### City of Reno
